name: FFXIclopedia - Wings of the Goddess Missions

nodes.title: Check the Lion Springs Tavern door (K-6) for another cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Lion Springs Tavern door (K-6) for another cutscene..

nodes.title: Go to Upper Jeuno and talk to Turlough (G-7) for a cutscene and the Mayakov Show Ticket.
nodes.description: Go to Upper Jeuno and talk to Turlough (G-7) for a cutscene and the Mayakov Show Ticket..

nodes.title: Return to Southern San d'Oria (S) and check the Lion Springs Tavern door for another cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to Southern San d'Oria (S) and check the Lion Springs Tavern door for another cutscene..

gates.description: Complete nation-specific Crystal War Quests 1-3 (The Fighting Fourth/Steamed Rams/Snake on the Plains, Better Part of Valor/Gifts of the Griffon/The Tigress Stirs, and Fires of Discontent/Claws of the Griffon/The Tigress Strikes)

nodes.title: Zone into East Ronfaure (S) from Southern San d'Oria (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into East Ronfaure (S) from Southern San d'Oria (S) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Head to (F-9) in La Vaule (S) and check the Reinforced Gateway for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to (F-9) in La Vaule (S) and check the Reinforced Gateway for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Check the Reinforced Gateway a second time to enter the battlefield for Purple, The New Black.
nodes.description: Check the Reinforced Gateway a second time to enter the battlefield for Purple, The New Black..

nodes.title: Upon victory on the battlefield a cutscene will take characters to (D-8) in La Vaule (S).
nodes.description: Upon victory on the battlefield a cutscene will take characters to (D-8) in La Vaule (S)..

nodes.title: If you're doing Rhapsodies of Vana'Diel, you can now continue with Ganged Up On
nodes.description: If you're doing Rhapsodies of Vana'Diel, you can now continue with Ganged Up On. It's recommended you finish Rhapsodies past either Of Light and Darkness (no longer need Lilisette) or Sin (Mission) (no longer need Cait Sith) before continuing Wings of the Goddess.

missions.title: In the Name of the Father

nodes.title: If you're doing Rhapsodies of Vana'diel, you don't need to do the below to continue that mission line
nodes.description: If you're doing Rhapsodies of Vana'diel, you don't need to do the below to continue that mission line. It's recommended to do Rhapsodies until you finish either Of Light and Darkness (no longer need Lilisette) or Sin (Mission) (no longer need Cait Sith) before continuing Wings of the Goddess.

location.zone: do the below to continue that mission line

nodes.title: Complete the next round of Nation quests:
nodes.description: Complete the next round of Nation quests:.

nodes.title: Check the Door: Lion Springs Tavern in Southern San d'Oria (S) (K-6) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Door: Lion Springs Tavern in Southern San d'Oria (S) (K-6) for a cutscene..

gates.description: Complete nation-specific Crystal War Quests 4-5 (Light in the Darkness/Boy and the Beast/Knot Quite There, and Burden of Suspicion/Wrath of the Griffon/A Manifest Problem)

nodes.title: Check the Lion Springs Tavern door in Southern San d'Oria (S) (K-6) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Lion Springs Tavern door in Southern San d'Oria (S) (K-6) for a cutscene..

gates.description: Complete nation-specific Crystal War Quests 6-7 (Chasing Dreams/Born of His Blade/The Double-Edged Sword, and Fires of Discontent/Claws of the Griffon/The Tigress Strikes)

nodes.title: Enter Beaucedine Glacier (S) to receive a cutscene and a Shadow bug.
nodes.description: Enter Beaucedine Glacier (S) to receive a cutscene and a Shadow bug..

location.zone: receive a cutscene and a Shadow bug

nodes.title: At Beaucedine Glacier (S), visit the 5 northernmost Pso'Xja towers listed below, and examine the Regal Pawprints found there
nodes.description: At Beaucedine Glacier (S), visit the 5 northernmost Pso'Xja towers listed below, and examine the Regal Pawprints found there.

location.zone: this walkthrough they are listed bottom-to-top

nodes.title: Return to Southern San d'Oria (S) and talk to Raustigne (I-7) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to Southern San d'Oria (S) and talk to Raustigne (I-7) for a cutscene..

gates.description: Complete nation-specific Crystal War Quests 8-9 (Whence Blows the Wind/His Majesty's Garden/The Heir to the Light, and Crescent Moon/Howl from the Heavens/Bonds of Mythril)

nodes.title: NOTE: NPC's listed in such a way as to reduce time spent looking for them

nodes.title: Return to Southern San d'Oria (S) and talk to Raustigne at (I-7) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to Southern San d'Oria (S) and talk to Raustigne at (I-7) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: This cutscene does not play properly in Windower with the FastCS plugin activated
nodes.description: This cutscene does not play properly in Windower with the FastCS plugin activated. Also if you have framerate set to 60.

location.zone: Windower with the FastCS plugin activated

nodes.title: You can reload FastCS afterwards with //lua load fastcs.
nodes.description: You can reload FastCS afterwards with //lua load fastcs..

nodes.title: Complete the next round of Nation quests:
nodes.description: Complete the next round of Nation quests:.

nodes.title: Head to Southern San d'Oria (S) and examine the Lion Springs Tavern door for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to Southern San d'Oria (S) and examine the Lion Springs Tavern door for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Head to Sauromugue Champaign (S) and examine the Bulwark Gate (F-6) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to Sauromugue Champaign (S) and examine the Bulwark Gate (F-6) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Zone into Xarcabard (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Xarcabard (S) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Check the Rally Point:Red (F-8) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Rally Point:Red (F-8) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Check the Rally Point:Green at (G-9) of Xarcabard (S) for a cutscene to receive a Magelight Signal Flare.
nodes.description: Check the Rally Point:Green at (G-9) of Xarcabard (S) for a cutscene to receive a Magelight Signal Flare..

nodes.title: Check the Spell-Worked Snow to the southeast to enter the battlefield.
nodes.description: Check the Spell-Worked Snow to the southeast to enter the battlefield..

location.zone: the southeast to enter the battlefield

nodes.title: Check the Rally Point:Blue (H-8 top left corner) in Xarcabard (S) for a cutscene, and you will be given the Alchemical signal flare.
nodes.description: Check the Rally Point:Blue (H-8 top left corner) in Xarcabard (S) for a cutscene, and you will be given the Alchemical signal flare..

nodes.title: Check the Excavated Snow to enter the assault (see Assault section for details).
nodes.description: Check the Excavated Snow to enter the assault (see Assault section for details)..

nodes.title: After winning the assault, check Rally Point:Red at (F-8) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: After winning the assault, check Rally Point:Red at (F-8) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Check the Red Rally Point (F-8) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Red Rally Point (F-8) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Enter Castle Zvahl Baileys (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Enter Castle Zvahl Baileys (S) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Head to (G-7) on the first map and click the Peculiar Glint for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to (G-7) on the first map and click the Peculiar Glint for a cutscene..

nodes.title: After the cutscene, you will receive a temporary key item Distress signal flare.
nodes.description: After the cutscene, you will receive a temporary key item Distress signal flare..

nodes.title: Have the party leader click the Peculiar Glint again to choose the option "Into the Beast's Maw."
nodes.description: Have the party leader click the Peculiar Glint again to choose the option "Into the Beast's Maw.".

nodes.title: After winning against the Count and Orcs, you will receive yet another cut scene.
nodes.description: After winning against the Count and Orcs, you will receive yet another cut scene..

nodes.title: Return to the "Rally Point:Red" in Xarcabard (S) (F-8) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to the "Rally Point:Red" in Xarcabard (S) (F-8) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Head to Sauromugue Champaign (S) and examine the "Bulwark Gate" (F-6) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to Sauromugue Champaign (S) and examine the "Bulwark Gate" (F-6) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Zone into Castle Zvahl Baileys (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Castle Zvahl Baileys (S) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: You must complete several quests to collect four Large Memory Fragments.
nodes.description: You must complete several quests to collect four Large Memory Fragments..

nodes.title: The next mission is automatically flagged once the below quests are completed.
nodes.description: The next mission is automatically flagged once the below quests are completed..

nodes.title: CLICK EACH QUEST FOR DETAILED INFO
nodes.description: CLICK EACH QUEST FOR DETAILED INFO.

nodes.title: Check any of the Cavernous Maws at any of the following locations for a cutscene with Cait Sith in Grauberg (S) :
nodes.description: Check any of the Cavernous Maws at any of the following locations for a cutscene with Cait Sith in Grauberg (S) :.

nodes.title: After exiting the maw, head to Grauberg (S).
nodes.description: After exiting the maw, head to Grauberg (S)..

nodes.title: Head to the Veridical Conflux at Grauberg (S) (F-5), unequip your weapons and check it for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to the Veridical Conflux at Grauberg (S) (F-5), unequip your weapons and check it for a cutscene..

nodes.title: After the next in-game day, zone, and check the Veridical Conflux in Grauberg (S) again for another cutscene
nodes.description: After the next in-game day, zone, and check the Veridical Conflux in Grauberg (S) again for another cutscene. Unlike the previous mission, you can check the Veridical Conflux with your weapons equipped.

nodes.title: Obtain a Punch Bug.
nodes.description: Obtain a Punch Bug..

nodes.title: Return to Grauberg (S) and trade the Punch Bug to the Veridical Conflux for a cutscene and the Bottled Punch Bug.
nodes.description: Return to Grauberg (S) and trade the Punch Bug to the Veridical Conflux for a cutscene and the Bottled Punch Bug..

nodes.title: Examine the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) in Grauberg (S) to enter the Walk of Echoes.
nodes.description: Examine the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) in Grauberg (S) to enter the Walk of Echoes..

nodes.title: Remove your weapons and shield and check the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) in Grauberg (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Remove your weapons and shield and check the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) in Grauberg (S) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: You must now collect eight dawndrops
nodes.description: You must now collect eight dawndrops. They can be collected in any order.

nodes.title: If you haven't finished Rhapsodies of Vana'diel past Of Light and Darkness, progressing past this mission will block progress until you finish A...
nodes.description: If you haven't finished Rhapsodies of Vana'diel past Of Light and Darkness, progressing past this mission will block progress until you finish A Forbidden Reunion.

nodes.title: Head to Grauberg (S) and check the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to Grauberg (S) and check the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Check the Ornate Door inside The Walk of Echoes for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Ornate Door inside The Walk of Echoes for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Check the Ornate Door again to enter a battlefield against Lady Lilith.
nodes.description: Check the Ornate Door again to enter a battlefield against Lady Lilith..

location.zone: to enter a battlefield against Lady Lilith

nodes.title: You will lose the Primal Glow upon entry.
nodes.description: You will lose the Primal Glow upon entry..

nodes.title: After the fight you will receive a cutscene and the Moonshade Earring.
nodes.description: After the fight you will receive a cutscene and the Moonshade Earring..

nodes.title: Return to Southern San d'Oria (S) and check the Door: "Lion Springs" at (K-6) for a cutscene and a Wedding Invitation.
nodes.description: Return to Southern San d'Oria (S) and check the Door: "Lion Springs" at (K-6) for a cutscene and a Wedding Invitation..

nodes.title: In Grauberg (S), examine the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) for a cutscene and the option to augment your Moonshade earring.
nodes.description: In Grauberg (S), examine the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) for a cutscene and the option to augment your Moonshade earring..
